tswitem.name: Blood of the Deep One King
tswitem.tooltip:
Â 
Blood of the Deep One King
Head Talisman(QL 10.9 Epic)
Character Bound
+1077 Heal Raiting
Whenever you critically heal a friend, you apply a beneficial effect which increases their Block, Evade, and Defence Rating by CR/2.5 for 7 seconds. The amount added increases with your Critical Rating. The duration of this effect is not refreshed when reapplied.
Empty Glyph Slot
